text: Rob Reckers (born 29 August 1981 in Eindhoven, Noord-Brabant) is a field hockey player from the Netherlands, who won the silver medal with the Dutch national team at the 2004 Summer Olympics in Athens.Olympic results ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male field hockey players Category:Olympic field hockey players of the Netherlands Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Netherlands Category:Field hockey players at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Field hockey players at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Eindhoven Category:Olympic medalists in field hockey Category:Medalists at the 2004 Summer Olympics
title: Rob Reckers
